Title: Fire and Ice
Writer: Ralph Bakshi (characters created by), Frank Frazetta (characters created by), Roy Thomas (screenplay), Gerry Conway (screenplay)
Actors: Randy Norton, Cynthia Leake, Steve Sandor, Sean Hannon
Plot: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.
